verses.roman:
vṛndāvane kalpa-drume suvarṇa-sadana
mahā-yogapīṭha tāhāṅ, ratna-siṁhāsana

synonyms: vṛndāvane—in Vṛndāvana; kalpa-drume—under the desire trees; suvarṇa-sadana—golden throne; mahā—great; yoga-pīṭha—pious temple; tāhāṅ—there; ratna—bedecked with jewels; siṁhāsana—throne.
translation: In Vṛndāvana, in a great place of pilgrimage underneath the desire trees, is a golden throne bedecked with jewels.
